title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams of all ranks and skill level.

body:
Hi everyone, 

Due to the lack of interest I have decided to cancel the Digital Puppet Masters Series of tournaments. 

I will however still be running the 1v1 Tournament each week, as I did this week with the same $10 RP gift card.

The winner this week was Urgot(won't mention player name without permission),  the prize was paid even though of the 8 player who registered
only 3 bothered to show up. So at this stage its fairly easy to win. 

 just a quick update. See you on the rift.
